_description: A song of the Nativity — five 9-line stanzas (ababcdddc) and 4-line burden: ‘Blyssid be that lady bryght / That bare a chyld off great myght / Withoute peyne as it ws right / Mayd mother marye’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines: Goddys sonne is bornehys moder is a maid…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…& offered hym gold encence & mure& to hys modere
                    mary
